# ISystemConsole.Out property

A TextWriter that represents a standard output of the console. IConsoleBuffer instances can write to this to render a console. InteractiveConsole instances will use this in their provided ISystemConsole instance when InteractiveConsole.Update() is called.

```csharp
public TextWriter Out { get; }
```
